name: A Vampyre Story: Year One
summary: An episodic prequel starring Mona, the opera-starlet-turned-vampire, and Froderick, wisecracking bat, as they explore more of Castle Warg and Draxsylvania, solve fiendish puzzles, and outwit hideous new creatures.
